review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick was exceedingly easy to setup, and user-friendly. The packaging was along the lines of a technology product of a much higher price point, however the remote itself is made of light plastic and feels cheaper than it looks. The buttons and menus are intuitive and easy to learn and use effectively. The use of bluetooth for the remote is a great addition and makes the responsiveness of the system seem almost instantaneous.
